TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SyndicationContent extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示新聞訂閱內容的基底類別。

span.span: A base class that represents syndication content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是抽象類別，而且無法直接將其具現化。This is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly. 它可用來做為下列新聞訂閱內容類型的基底類別：It is used as the base class for the following syndication content types: - - -

summary.span: 取得此內容的屬性延伸。

span.span: Gets the attribute extensions for this content.

value.span: 字典，其中包含此物件屬性延伸的集合。

span.span: A dictionary that contains the attribute extensions for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 新聞訂閱物件模型可讓您新增自訂屬性至新聞訂閱內容類型 (例如 )。The syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a syndication content type (for example, ). 序列化為 Atom 1.0 時，這些屬性會在 `` 項目中出現。When serialized to Atom 1.0, these attributes appear within the `` element. 序列化為 RSS 2.0 時，這些屬性都會遭忽略。When serialized to RSS 2.0, these attribute are ignored. ## Examples 下列 XML 會說明新增至 執行個體的自訂屬性，如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how a custom attribute added to a instance is serialized to Atom 1.0. ``` Some text content ```

summary.span: 取得新聞訂閱內容類型。

value.span: 新聞訂閱內容類型的名稱。

span.span: The name of the type of syndication content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性為抽象，因此必須在新聞訂閱內容類型的執行個體上存取 (自 衍生的類別)。This property is abstract, so it must be accessed on an instance of a syndication content type (a class derived from ). .NET Framework 會定義下列新聞訂閱內容類型：The .NET Framework defines the following syndication content types: - - - - 此類別包含許多靜態 Helper 方法，用來建立各種類型的新聞訂閱內容：This class contains a number of static helper methods for creating the various types of syndication content: - - - - - - -
